name: Death Set In Stone
description:
You are a CUBE! Make it to the finish (denoted by the large arrow pointing at it from the top). You will DIE every 10 seconds. However, your corpse will remain! Make yourself your own future you's platforms when you die to be able to finish the level. You have a maxiumum of 60 seconds to complete the level (10 seconds, 6 lives).

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump (1.25s cooldown)

1 = X

2 = Y

3 = Z

Q - Shrink

E - Expand

R - Restart level

The keys 1, 2, 3 select which axis to shrink or expand. The current selected axis will be displayed at the bottom right.

Tip: On the final level, you will have to use the "stick" mechanic. Press yourself up against the wall with the camera facing forward, and you will be able to stick to it. This may be difficult.
